automated.desc: Does this job start up when the server starts?

delay.desc: The amount of time in milliseconds before starting the listener.

data.desc: Any additional data that the job requires

idleThreshold.desc: The amount of time in milliseconds to wait before checking if the job should be run.

timeOfDay.desc: The time of day in which auditing should occur in 24 hour format, 00:00 to 24:00.
